name: Smiling Dancers
description:
Your parents have signed you up for dance lessons, however the mascots at Smiling Dancers dont want you to dance to your hearts content, or will fate catch up to you before you can?.. one more thing, boogie is watching.

Cover Art: https://twitter.com/pb_jamine

Twitter: https://twitter.com/smiledancersco

Creators Twitter: https://twitter.com/KhariDoodles
